alert.note: Alert for Arches, Grand Flat; Canyonlands, Natural Bridges; La Sal and Abajo Mountains; Southeast Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 15 at 10:35AM MDT until August 15 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Colorado and Utah, including the following areas, in southwest Colorado, Four Corners/Upper Dolores River and Paradox Valley/Lower Dolores River. In Utah, Arches/Grand Flat, Canyonlands/Natural Bridges, La Sal and Abajo Mountains and Southeast Utah. * WHEN...Through late this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of arroyos, creeks, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Low-water crossings may be flooded or possibly washed out. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Portions of southwest Colorado and southeast Utah have received heavy rainfall and experienced flooding the past few days. Additional strong thunderstorms with heavy rainfall are anticipated to form again today increasing the threat of flash flooding.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Arches, Grand Flat; Canyonlands, Natural Bridges; La Sal and Abajo Mountains; Southeast Utah
